subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt can burnish his legacy in London, where he could become the second man in the 100 meters and the first in the 200 to win back-to-back golds.
snippet: Usain Bolt can burnish his legacy in London, where he could become the second man in the 100 meters and the first in the 200 to win back-to-back golds.
